response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This innovative solution has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize the way you operate your business, potentially saving you thousands of dollars in the long run. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it can bring to your organization, we believe its worth exceeds $1,200,000. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This is an opportunity to secure a cutting-edge tool that could significantly impact your business's growth and efficiency. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.", "product_price": 1500000}
